Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to merge two logs Lets analyze each log Log A has eventtype Order Received Order Validated Payment Processed Item Shipped Item Delivered Timestamps 20231010T100000Z Order Received 20231010T100130Z Order Validated 20231010T100200Z Payment Processed 20231010T100500Z Item Shipped 20231010T102000Z Item Delivered Log B has timestamps 20231010T095958Z OrderReceived 20231010T100129Z OrderValidation 20231010T100205Z PaymentCheck 20231010T100300Z Quality Check 20231010T100502Z Shipping

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Order Received A vs OrderReceived B Timestamps A 100000 B 095958 Difference 2 seconds Within tolerance 2 seconds So match

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Order Validated A vs OrderValidation B A 100130 B 100129 diff 1 sec Match

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Payment Processed A vs PaymentCheck B A 100200 B 100205 diff 5 sec tolerance 2 sec But might still be same note Payment gateway delay Could be same event However per spec only match if within tolerance

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: spec says If timestamps differ by less than 2 seconds consider them the same event So strict Shouldnt match leave them separate

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Item Shipped A at 100500 Bs Shipping at 100502 diff 2 seconds Within tolerance That qualifies as match

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Item Delivered appears only in A not in B Quality Check is B only no match in A

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Thus merged events combine attributes for matched pairs include all attributes from both logs If timestamps differ slightly select one as primary or include both Use timestamp from Log A as primary since primary timeline include timestamp from Log B as timestamp B

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: present events in chronological order based on a chosen primary timestamp Use timestamp from Log A primary sort by timestamp A

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Doublecheck everything Check each match 1 Order Received diff 2 sec Tolerance 2 sec inclusive 2 Order Validated diff 1 sec ok 3 Item Shipped diff 2 sec ok Payment diff 5 sec not matched
